Reviews.Title: Tiny but good quality!
Reviews.Author: SusanM
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera, can take pictures up close or wide angle.  I'm not a professional by any means but this takes care of my basic needs.  The Easy Share button isn't really a feature I'm impressed with but it doesn't detract from anything either so I just ignore it.  Good battery life.Just FYI - the last Kodak I bought shipped with a CD to load the software to put the pictures on your computer.  I spent quite a bit of time searching for that CD with this one before giving up and plugging it in with the hope that the old software would be able to handle it.  Turns out the new software is shipped in the camera!  So just plug it in and follow the prompts.

Reviews.Title: Simple for Basic Use
Reviews.Author: kimy
Reviews.Content: Easy to use right out the box. Discovered it's not good at taking pictures at night since it does not have different environment settings to choose from, so it's very basic. It has a lag time after taking a picture to re-enter the screen to take another photo. And a slight lag time when snapping a photo, so sometimes I get blurred pictures and have to re-try and stay steady for a longer time after pressing the button to take a photo. It's really lightweight which is an advantage! If you want a no-fuss, simple photo camera this is it! But don't expect more than that :)

Reviews.Title: Great, easy to use point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: Amber J. Brantly "Amberjoyc"
Reviews.Content: This kodak camera is very user friendly.  It is simple to use and easy to set up with your computer.  With two babies, I always keep a camera handy to capture those "moments."  When my camera got smashed in the diaper bag, I had to quickly replace it, and was pleased to find this Kodak Easy Share camera.  Good price.  And quick shipping.An added bonus is its red color - not easily confused with other people's cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: DM "pretzel girl"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 6 months.  I carry it in a pocket of my purse so I can take quality pictures anytime.  This past week we took it on vacation and my daughter fell into a stream while it was in her pocket so the camera was completely submerged (along with my daughter).  It was dead and the SD card was empty.  I pulled out the SD card and the battery and let it dry out.  A few hours later, everything was as good as new! I was very impressed, I never expected a camera to survive a swim!The only drawback is that there aren't a lot of different options on the camera, the burst is pretty slow.  If you don't care much about the extra features, it's a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera, but the Camera is Picky About SD Card
Reviews.Author: NoRelations
Reviews.Content: I'm upgrading from a cheap Vivitar camera to this Kodak Easyshare m522, and its a huge much needed step. The pictures it takes are truly stunning and high quality. For the price, it really is an excellent deal, but unfortunately it won't accept the SD card I had with the Vivitar (a cheap SD card that I bought at Walmart). I ordered a Kodak brand 4GB SD card shortly after discovering that. I'm sure there are cheaper alternatives I could have opted for, but I'm not going to take any chances. For now, the internal memory will accept a measly 6 pictures. Thankfully I'm not in too much of a hurry to make use of the camera. I'm hoping I'll have it working before my camping trip in a week, because I love taking wildlife and nature pictures.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M Reisen
Reviews.Content: When the picture comes out its good that's about one in 6 pictures.Bluriness is a constant issue. Flash pictures dont have good clarity most of the time. There's the problem - you never know if the picture is going to be a bust.Deeply regret buying.

Reviews.Title: Good upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Ingalls "laptop guru"
Reviews.Content: I hadn't bought a new camera since 2006 so I figured it was time to upgrade. This is a good camera for the price. Takes good standard pictures. The only thing I highly dislike is that the flash is in such a place that I always cover it with my finger, so I've had to change how I hold a camera completely. I've never had this issue with any other camera. Like I said this was an upgrade I had a kodak that looked almost exactly like this one only it didn't have the rounded corners and was a little thicker. Another thing is you have a wait time in between pictures. Even though it doesn't say you do, if you take a picture right after you already took one the flash doesn't go off and then you again have to take another picture. The processing time is a little slow but overall it's a really nice camera for everyday pictures.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: J. Hewlett
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about 2 years ago.  While it took great pictures, after the 2 years, the camera wouldn't charge anymore.  I went online to search out the camera, and this seems to be a common theme amongst the Kodak Easyshare cameras.  I went and bought a new battery as they suggested, but it still wouldn't charge.  It would come on for only a second and then shut off right away again.  I didn't want to invest any more money by buying a new powercord as they suggests as another option. I felt the one that I had was just fine, and I didn't want to invest that much money into a camera that didn't cost that much.  I don't think I will stick with this brand of camera.  I'm planning on looking for something else.

Reviews.Title: Definitely impressed.
Reviews.Author: nanocluster
Reviews.Content: Super pleased with this item! My boss has an older model which is pretty weighty and I was glad to have received a much slimmer product. In combination with the carrying case, it is perfect for point-and-shoot stuff with my daughter. Great quality.I use Ubuntu, so no EasyShare button for me.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Bryan Kent Street
Reviews.Content: I purchase this as a Christmas gift for my less than tech savvy mother.  She had no problems learning how to use the camera and download the photos to her computer.  She is extremely satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Louise
Reviews.Content: For a camera with a small price - this camera does everything.  I have been reading the online manual and am completely amazed at the things it does do.  I love the size - no bigger than a pack of cigarettes.  Very very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Doesnt stay closed..
Reviews.Author: SSS
Reviews.Content: I got this camera a couple days before i went on a vacation. Yes, I read all the reviews and thought it would be the best choice over Best Buy. So  I got it... I wished now I didnt. My whole vacation was ruined because the compartment that holds the battery and the sd card never locked. So unfortunately i lost my sd card and battery. I had to put surgical tape on it just to lock it in, but that didnt stop it. Never stayed sealed shut even with the tape on it... Buyers beware.. I would not recommend this camera because of that. I would go back to my old camera in a heart beat. I am returning this back to Amazon... I dont like to do reviews like this --- i like good reviews instead of bad reviews . Not happy  lost over 2000 pictures..No pictures at all

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: Lacey Blosser
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product. It takes great pictures and has many different settings, edit, crop..options. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Camera is easy to use and shipped in a great timely matter
Reviews.Author: Renae Pierrard
Reviews.Content: The camera is simple for quick work in a maintenance planner job. I can take pictures of the equipment the employees will work on, download them and use snagit to draw comments and instruction on the picture. Makes things less confusing.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Hernany
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera, can take pictures up close or wide angle. I'm not a professional by any means but this takes care of my basic needs. The Easy Share button isn't really a feature I'm impressed with but it doesn't detract from anything either so I just ignore it. Good battery life.Just FYI - the last Kodak I bought shipped with a CD to load the software to put the pictures on your computer. I spent quite a bit of time searching for that CD with this one before giving up and plugging it in with the hope that the old software would be able to handle it. Turns out the new software is shipped in the camera! So just plug it in and follow the prompts.

Reviews.Title: awsum
Reviews.Author: Sadaf batool
Reviews.Content: it is just perfect and its result is excellent everything is best and i just love it so much and even it didnt cause any problem

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Kanita
Reviews.Content: Good gift idea.  It is just the right camera fit for someone who likes to take pictures and getting use to a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Maureen Connerly
Reviews.Content: Great camera while it lasted. I would recommend getting insurance on any camera you get online. This was a gift for my boyfriend and a few months later his apartment was broken into and it was one of the many things stolen.

Reviews.Title: Great gift !
Reviews.Author: RJ11
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift well over a year now and no problems.. The person i got this for was always running out of film and i purchased the memory card also to go with this. It took a while for her to warm up to this camera because she had to learn how to use it, but now she loves it and it takes great pictures too. I was able to give this 5 stars because i used this camera quite a bit while showing the person how to use it.( although it is very easy to use)

Reviews.Title: best features.
Reviews.Author: nicole charles
Reviews.Content: this was ordered for a friend and they were pleased, the price was priceless, and the color is beautiful. well done.

Reviews.Title: Stay clear of this one!
Reviews.Author: In2books
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an earlier model digital Kodak. I read the reviews before purchasing and compared features with other brands. I was all set to really like this camera, however, it is one of the worst cameras I have ever used. The vast majority of pictures come out blurry. I might get one shot out of five that looks good. I even pulled out the detailed instruction manual (vs the quick start) and read and followed the directions, with no improvement in results.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: jhon
Reviews.Content: BUEN VENDEDOR, ATENTO, ARTICULO RESPETA TODAS LAS CONDICIONES DE VENTA OFERTADAS POR EL VENDEDOR,EL PRODUCTO LLEGO EN LA FECHA INDICADA, VERDADERAMENTE EXCELENTE...GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Henri
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a replacement for the same model that quit working after it suffered damage from water. It was in a  camera bag, but fell into a water puddle very briefly during a rain storm. I opened and allowed the camera to dry but afterward the LCD would not work and pictures were blank. This type of damage was not covered under warranty. Otherwise I liked the camera as long as it doesn't get wet.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Franco "Gustavo Franco"
Reviews.Content: This camera have all what I need. Excellent for me. If you good camera, god resolution, easy to use and good quality, check this reference. Regards!

Reviews.Title: You better buy extra batterys
Reviews.Author: New New
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera back in 2010. It work real good for about 6 months. Then it took a turn for the worst! Remind you I only used it (took pictures) about 5 times. My battery stop working. It don't charge and I actually brought a new battery , still nothing. I'm going to try buying a newer battery because I need a camera for my wedding in March but after reading the reviews from the Kodak website I don't think buying a new battery will work. If I was you I would only get this camera if I didn't need it for long. Overrall it takes great pictures and is very light weight. I just wish I had done more on it , but I'm not giving up so fast. Good Luck with this thing! On the website they don't even sell this camera any longer

Reviews.Title: It does it ALL
Reviews.Author: john tanzella
Reviews.Content: Camera is small and takes great pictures. 14 MP gives me a sharp photo, even enlarged. A great bargain and it's a Kodak. A brand to trust.

Reviews.Title: beautiful!
Reviews.Author: junior
Reviews.Content: very nice camera,picture quality is great. it is certainly a camera from those who are not so "good" at taking pictures,that is, it captures pics well while moving.

Reviews.Title: Dud.....
Reviews.Author: MissMish510 "Always Looking For A Deal :)"
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera on Monday night....received it Wednesday morning. I was so excited. I was in need of a replacement for months now after having a water accident with the last one in Calistoga. I searched the website for days trying to figure the best deal to get the best bang for my buck and while Amazon has many great deals I finally just settled with this one.Kodak's are my favorite cameras I have never had any trouble out of them any of them. So I figured at best I'd be getting a known reliable camera product. Not the case with this one. I ordered it in silver. After unpacking it and placing it on the charger I had to go online to check the light status for charging. It was blinking red and then went to sitting still at red. In my experience with any charging device red means charging and it goes to green to let you know charging is complete. Not this one...blinking is charging and a still light means charged. No big deal other than it could mention that on the brief leaflet that comes with the camera in the way of getting started instructions, again no big deal.After the camera had charged some I unplugged it, turned it on just fine, took a couple shots just to see how the pics looked. So far so good I was pleased. Placed the camera back on the charger for it to continue powering up. End of the day coworker comes by to check out my nifty new camera....I hand it to her and she presses the power on button.....nothing......I take the camera back from her and press the button just the same.....nothing.....plug it up to the charger the light goes red....still.....its completely charged....turns on plugged up.....unplugged shuts off wouldnt come back on.....plugged it up again this time no charging light but the camera would still come on plugged up.....So I put in my request for a refund shipped back out the same day and I will be continuing my search. It is likely I will not get a Kodak this time around just due to my disappointment.The pictures I snapped looked great but I didnt want to take a chance on getting a replacement of the same camera and it being another dud. I missed the opportunity to have it for our first camping trip over the weekend but was totally excited to have it for my daughter's first day of 1st grade. Not anymore. So I will have to wait on the camera and dish out more dough to get another camera for that occasion. Pain in the butt.....From my experience Kodak is a great camera/printing company this is a first and I am not happy. Buy at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: dissatisfied
Reviews.Content: I have had several Kodak easyshare camera's in the past with very little compliants. This camera however has driven me crazy enough to write my first ever review; no joke!! I HATE THIS CAMERA; it freezes constantly. I have to take the battery out to shut the stupid thing off; The processing delays are horendous (sp). I take a picture and hold the button until the pictures takes and after a few seconds of waiting for the camera to take the picture i quit waiting, take my finger off the button and the stupid camera decides to take a picture. Did i mention it freezes up constantly.  I bought this camera 3 months ago to take to California to see my grandkids for christmas. I had not used the camera that much prior to my trip. Unfortunatly (sp) the 30 day return policy had expired and now i am left with a camera that is useless and my christmas spent with my grandkids went without being able to take pictures with my new camera. Thank goodness for IPhone..Will I buy a Kodak again? NO NO NOp.s (I did not buy the camera from amazon)

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kodak Easy Share M522
Reviews.Author: cross country skier
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kodak Easy Share M522 camera. easy to use and easy to share picturesI got a red one easy's to find!!I liked this one as you can charge the battery.It take's very good pictures,clouds, videos etc.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: rosedaisy
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't recommend this camera! Most pictures comes out blurry, which sucks for me because I have a 2year old and 1 on the way, so some of those moments only happen once. Only plus about this camera, the battery life is long. But the plug in charger wouldn't charge it! This is my second time having to send it in for repair cause once again it's not charging. I always been a kodak fan, but not for this one!!

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share M522 14 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Ev
Reviews.Content: A very poor excuse for a digital camera. The ease of using this camera is in question and the quality of the pictures leaves a lot to be desired.  I have an older Easy Share that was wonderful, but this one just doesn't make the grade.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Peaches
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It is everything and more than what I expected it to be.  The camera is small and light weight, it fits very nice into my pocketbook.  I am so glad that I purchased this camera.  It was also a good price.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures. I would  definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: HannahBanana
Reviews.Content: Great camera! It's very small so you can carry it anywhere and the pictures are great! I would recomend this camera to anyone and it came very quickly.

Reviews.Title: OK for the amatuer
Reviews.Author: S. Lee
Reviews.Content: I have yet to take a really good picture with this camera.  I admit I am coming from a SLR and after many years have broken down and gone digital.  I do really like the share feature which allows me to easily download pictures on my laptop.  OK for the amatuer, but serious photographers should stay away.

Reviews.Title: Nice and simple
Reviews.Author: bori
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice and simple. Nothing spectacular. Pictures are pretty good quality when you take then inside and outdoors. Zoom is only 4x but it's not bad for an inexpensive camera. I got it for travelling and I hope it will do a nice job.

Reviews.Title: Lemon!!!
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: So as soon as I get the camera, I put it to charge as the instruction manual directs to do, the light is red, meaning the battery is almost dead, leave it charging over night, and the battery never charged.  I take it to work, put it to charge at work, same thing, light doesn't even turn on.  This is the 2nd Kodak I have problems with, my previous one would spit the memory card out, something was wrong with the spring.

Reviews.Title: I'm Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera!Compact and simple to use.Great photo quality!I'm Impressed!I bought 2!

Reviews.Title: its cool
Reviews.Author: weeeeeeeeeh
Reviews.Content: i love the tablet cases that i got, it is really awesome, the colors too re great, its like a matching color to my outfits. its easy to fit. The point is that i love it because its not a waste of money

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Joe Schoolfield
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son who is eleven and it is super powerful and easy to use and I would recommend this to someone who wants a small, inexpensive camera to carry

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: V. G. Griffin "v.g. griffin"
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly, this is a Christmas gift for my daughter, I know she will love it....Thanks Amazon! KODAK IS A GREAT PRODUCT....

Reviews.Title: excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Radalia Pelayo
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, easy to use, great images, plus the price is very good compared to other models with similar features, I recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Grum
Reviews.Content: As this is my first digital camera and I am not very knowledgeable about cameras I rated this a 4 to err on the side of caution.I am thrilled with my purchase and just wish I could find more stuff to photograph! Excellent buy for my beginner stage.

Reviews.Title: buena
Reviews.Author: smejia1283
Reviews.Content: excelente adquisición para hacer un regalode verdad la persona quedo sorprendidahasta dijo me puedes regalar otra para mi proximo cumpleanos

ProductInfo.Features:
14 MP, 4x Optical Zoom
Kodak's Share button lets you choose your favorite sharing destination, e-mail address, or Kodak Pulse Display
Small and pocketable styling makes it a snap to take along wherever you go
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare M522 14 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD - Black
